title: Is really Google Photo in Original Resolution useful for pixel 3 or 4 ?
content:
Google pixel is sold with a temporary Unlimited space for Google Photo - Original Photos mode.
But Google pixel camera has 12 Mpixel sensor , google Original photo mode is useful for more than 16 Mpixel cameras, not for any google pixel who could still use the standard free Unlimited storage High quality.  Am i right, that the Original Photos for this phone is completely unnecessary ?
